text: "3+ years working as a database developer working with PostgreSQL
text.1: Expert Level SQL, PL/SQL, including stored procedures, functions, triggers, and views.
text.2: Knowledge of JSON and PostgreSQL support for JSON.
text.3: =C2=B7 AWS Cloud experience is a must
text.4: =C2=B7 Ability to efficiently write database code without compromising data quality, privacy or security.
text.5: =C2=B7 Knowledge of database design principles, query optimization, index management, integrity checks, statistics, and isolation levels
text.6: =C2=B7 Excellent verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills
text.7: =C2=B7 Ability to evaluate alternative solutions and/or workarounds
text.12: =C2=B7 Hands on development experience in Data migration and writing queries.
